TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
Wow, so many people here with lots of rep. Mine is nonexistent but it is just amazing to see everyone here with enough rep to fill a city!!! Great job everyone!

P.S. don't ask why I commented, I had nothing better to do ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Only 14 away now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
just 2...

> 
> Wow, so many people here with lots of rep. Mine is nonexistent but it is just amazing to see everyone here with enough rep to fill a city!!! Great job everyone!
> P.S. don't ask why I commented, I had nothing better to do ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Just a friendly reminder that rep is completely useless and often has no correlation with one's actual charisma and contribution to the community, and that it's meaningless to obsess over it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Just a friendly reminder that rep is completely useless and often has no correlation with one's actual charisma and contribution to the community, and that it's meaningless to obsess over it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Good point, I forgot about that, but there is a good side to bragging on ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). 

I have 10 rep, two from here (don't ask) but I want to know how to find how much till my next bar.
Only 4 more points! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

only 97 more points! But don't rep me here, rep me for the law in Eve: Order Zero!

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Just a friendly reminder that rep is completely useless and often has no correlation with one's actual charisma and contribution to the community, and that it's meaningless to obsess over it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ah, but how some of us stress out about having a bunch of green bars of various shades next to our name! It may not mean anything in the forum or in KSP, but it obviously means something somewhere... Think about it, there's this thread dedicated to it, we all get excited to see we've received it... so, there must be *somethin*g to it... ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Its psychological.
I have 165 rep till the 2nd light green, and notably, I made a space shuttle! ![Ly5P1To.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Ly5P1To.jpg)
Just 2 more points.
Nobody gives me rep so IDK.
I think a hundred or so.
31 points till my first Light-Green bar!
118 points so i uh.... how far away is that?

Two whole points. It seems like forever for my next rank.

I have the rank, don't need to give me rep!

Now it is 90 points!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-17T22:40:33Z" title="11/17/2015 10:40  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 17, 2015</time> by legoclone09**
140, I think.
Really freaking far away.
49 reps, so halfway there!!

138 to my second light-green bar, recently made a triple barrel torpedo launcher!  

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cn6J1yy.gif[/IMG]
Currently at 65. I have 35 to go!
I just got my second bar!!!

[quote name='CliftonM']I just got my second bar!!![/QUOTE]  

I'm only 20 points away from my third bar...
Really far away.
I think I need 40-ish points for a fourth bar. That's 8 reps.
